file_content.text: Horizon Guard. Vaylin's executioner squad.
She's really pulling out the big guns to conquer Voss.
Greetings, Commander.
What else have you seen? The smallest detail may be the difference between victory and defeat.
Your visions can help us.
I make my own future. If the Voss were smarter, they'd do the same.
Only fools trust prophecy.
Everyone walks a different path.
Hello, Outlander.
I'm glad you escaped to safety. But you should've come to me sooner.
Good to see you.
I couldn't take that risk.
You look good for someone I almost blasted into a million pieces.
Hello, traitor.
A turn of events I hope we won't repeat.
Arcann is with me now. On Voss.
Of course. Vaylin's only attacking the planet to burn her family out of hiding.
And now she leaves me no choice. I need your help, Outlander. Arcann needs your help.
Your son froze me in carbonite for five years, then tried to kill me--many times. Why would I help him now?
Tell me why I should help.
He can change.
My son deserves a second chance.
I brought him here to mend his broken body, cure him of his hatred. Then Vaylin found us...
We don't have much time. Help me hold off my daughter's army. Once Arcann's healed, he'll join your fight. I know it.
Save Arcann. Didn't see that one coming.
If she's right, he could help us turn the tide of war.
Arcann could be an ally.
Or stab us in the back. Either way, we'll be ready.
Senya can't be trusted. But if she's desperate enough to beg for help, now is the perfect time to strike.
We should kill them both.
And eliminate two of the galaxy's most dangerous fugitives.
Senya's call originated from the Shrine of Healing.
My shuttle can get us close, but we'll have to make the final assault on foot.
Lana, gather a Mandalorian team and converge on the shrine. Theron and I will lead the charge for Arcann and Senya. We can't let Vaylin reach them first.
They're torching the planet without me!
The Alliance seeks a confrontation, Empress. You are wise to deny them that pleasure.
Mother's all I care about. Smashing her hopes, watching her beg for mercy... Maybe I'll throw a party and dance to her screams.
She is not your only obstacle. Mandalorians helped the Alliance break our assault on Voss-Ka. Their victory signals a new force on the battlefield.
The Outlander...
The vessel holding your father's spirit.
My entire family on Voss. We're going to have so much fun.
The Mystics will stay. The Commandos will join the Alliance in battle.
For what it's worth, I regret firing on your ship. I blame the heat of battle.
Sorry I shot you.
It's in the past. The future is what matters.
If I needed help, your son wouldn't think twice about finishing me off.
That's a big request.
Once that was true. But he can change.
You want to help him? Drive your lightsaber through his chest.
Your son deserves death.
Tell your people to stay inside the tower, and they'll be sheltered from Vaylin's attack.
The Voss are safe now.
Senya.
I trusted you, Senya. Why did you turn against me?
Explain yourself.
I had to protect my son.
Your daughter's busy ransacking Voss. I don't have time to reminisce with traitors.
You're wasting my time.
Wait. This concerns my daughter... and my son.
What do you think, Theron?
What do you suggest?
Apprehend and interrogate. Only way to tell if he's worth saving.
Extermination is safer. The Alliance can't risk war against both of Valkorion's spawn.
The Voss and Gormak unite there to defend our home. They will aid your fight.
The Voss feared your defeat. I knew better. I saw a vision of your arrival.
I saw raining fire, an empty throne... The rest is lost in darkness.
We've got a distress call coming in hot. Stand by...
Sounds like a fun bunch. Let's get you to our command post before more show up.
They're taking too long. I told you I should lead the hunt!
